column1: #Text=All the past Avatars , all their experience and wisdom , is available to you if you look deep inside yourself .
#Text=" Aang says : " So where am I , Roku ?
#Text=" Avatar Roku says : " I ... do n't know , Aang .
#Text=But I see you are lost in more ways than one right now .
#Text=I need to figure out what to do once I face the Fire Lord .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Well , look who 's here !
